body: The problem is that there doesn't seem to be a macro that I can use for cmake builds specifically. So if I just excluded this test from tf_tests.cmake, the test would still be run in Linux cmake builds and fail because of the PLATFORM_GOOGLE macro I applied in debug_io_utils.cc. Do you know of a macro defined specifically for cmake builds? If not, I think the approach here is the cleanest. This test used to run and pass in open-source bazel tests (e.g., on Linux and Mac), but since the server side of grpc:// debug URLs is not defined in open source anyway, open-source users aren't able to use the feature yet anyway. I don't think it's going it's going to cause any problems to exclude it for now.
